column2: For example, it has been shown that Vascular endothelial growth factor production by stimulated mononuclear cells from subjects with the -2578C/C or -1154G/G genotypes is significantly higher than those found in subjects with the -2578A/A and -1154A/A genotypes, respectively (Shahbazi et al., 2002).
